{{ja-kanjitab|ら|せん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
{{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=らせん}}. Date of borrowing unknown. Compare modern {{cog|zh|螺旋|tr=luóxuán}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ɺ̠a̠sẽ̞ɴ]}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|ら|せん|ɺ̠a̠˨ sẽ̞ɴ˦}}<ref>{{R:NHK Hatsuon}}</ref>

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|らせん}}

# a [[helix]], a [[spiral]]
# a [[screw]]

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|螺%旋%階%段|ら%せん% かい%だん}}: a [[spiral]] [[staircase]]
* {{ja-r|螺%旋%形|ら%せん%けい}}: a [[helix]] or [[spiral]] [[shape]]
* {{ja-r|螺%旋%状|ら%せん%じょう}}: a [[helix]] or [[spiral]] [[shape]]
* {{ja-r|螺%旋%状%菌|ら%せん%じょう% きん}}: a [[spirillum]] (a spiral-shaped [[bacterium]])
* {{ja-r|螺%旋%推%進%機|ら%せん% すい%しん%き}}: a [[screw]] (as for a [[ship]] or [[boat]]; obsolete, replaced by [[propeller]]s)
* {{ja-r|螺%旋%水%揚%機|ら%せん% みず%-あげ% き}}: an [[Archimedes]] [[screw]], a screw-shaped [[water]] [[pump]]
